title: Error Right before game starts
body:
So this has happened right before the start of 3 games now.  I had just won 2 of my first games of the day and it just started closing out the game window and giving me an error message talking about video drivers
   
I checked my video drivers and theyre all up to date.  I even manually uploaded a driver i dont even think I need just to be sure and it didnt fix it.  Turned off my fire wall and nothing changes.  On my second attempt to start a game the LoL 
client said something to the point of it downscaling to the old client,  whatever that may mean, and I had to update the actual league client, but that didnt fix it either.  Help pls.  I dont know how many reports have been sent in on me from this.

Tried to do one more game with some thing I thought would fix it and this is what the error message says.

An Unknown DirectX error has occurred and League of Legends cannot start.  Please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the manufacturer.

end of error message.

replies.body:
well after a fourth failed try I tried to play rocket league and it would not load up fully.   so i restarted my pc and went directly back to league and it ran as normal.   
The error has yet to reappear.
Thanks very much for the response.

Typically those directx errors can be traced back to some kind of odd interaction between your graphics drivers and the client, but let's try a slightly different approach since you've already updated those drivers. Check out [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115006740568--May-3-Click-here-if-you-ve-crashed-and-received-a-DirectX-error-or-if-you-see-an-offset-loading-screen-), and let me know if that's able to help!
